actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a Commission on Graduate Education.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a Commission on Graduate Education. Directs the Commission to transmit to the President and the Congress an interim report within one year after its first meeting and a final report within two years after its first meeting. Terminates the Commission two years after its first meeting. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a Commission on Graduate Education.
